name: !eM pleH
effect:
Can only be played if the card titled Head is in your Ring area.
Reverse any card and end your opponent's turn.
When this card is in your Ring area, the card titled Head is considered Permanent.
Raw logo
Unique

name: 3 Minute Warning
effect:
Superstar Ability:
Once during each of your turns you may draw 3 cards and then discard 3 cards.
Whenever you successfully play a card with the Raw logo, put up to 3 cards from your Ringside pile at the bottom of your Arsenal.
Your cards titled Did I Just Say ... Three Minutes? are not Active.
You may play the card titled Rico Enters! and it is considered to have the Raw logo.
You cannot play any title belt except the Tag Team Title Belts.

name: <inhale> Gooooooooooldust
effect:
Reverse any Action card and end your opponent's turn. Your opponent must discard 2 cards.
Raw logo
Unique
"Don't tempt me with a nibble - when I am just going to take a whole bite." - Goldust

name: A Shattered Dreams Production
effect:
At the end of the Pre-match phase, look at your opponent's hand, choose 1 card, and your opponent must shuffle the chosen card into his Arsenal.
Raw logo
Unique

name: A Victim of the Crippler
effect:
Your opponent cannot play Manager or Stipulation cards.
If your opponent is Chris Jericho, Kurt Angle, Eddie Guerrero, Booker T, or The People's Champion your Superstar Ability now reads as "Each turn, the first maneuver you play is +2D, the next is +4D, the next is +6D, and so forth."
Smackdown logo
Unique
Permanent

name: Abdominal Rake
effect:
Cannot be played if the card titled First to Tap Out Match is in your Ring area.
As a maneuver, if the next card you play this turn is a Grapple or Submission maneuver, it cannot be reversed.
As a reversal, reverse any Submission maneuver and end your opponent's turn. If the first card you play on your next turn is a Grapple or Submission maneuver, it cannot be reversed.

name: An Irresistible Force; An Immovable Object
effect:
As an action, if your next card played this turn is an Action card, it cannot be reversed.
As a reversal, reverse any Grapple or Submission maneuver (including the card titled Clutch onto Opponent) and end your opponent's turn.
Smackdown logo
Unique

name: Back-and-Forth Action
effect:
Shuffle 1 card with Stun Value from your Ringside pile into your Arsenal and draw 1 card.
When this card is in your Ring area, the player with the highest Stun Value in his Ring area may play his cards with Stun Value at -#F, where # is equal to the Stun Value in his Ring area.

name: Backstage Warm-up Routine
effect:
At the end of the Pre-match phase, if your opponent has a lower Superstar Value than you, his Starting Hand Size is -2; if your opponent has a greater Superstar Value than you, your Starting Hand Size is +2.
Smackdown logo
Unique

name: Beg For Mercy
effect:
Can only be played if you have 4 different Maneuver card types of 4D or greater in your Ring area.
When this card is in your Ring area, your opponent's maneuvers played do no more than a maximum of 2D.
Active

name: Big Freak'n Uppercut
effect:
As a reversal, reverse any Strike maneuver and end your opponent's turn.
Raw logo
Unique
Stun Value: 1
"After that uppercut, a whole door of opportunities just opened up for this powerhouse..." - Jim Ross

name: Bionic Elbow
effect:
Can only be played after a successfully played Strike maneuver.
Cannot be reversed from your opponent's Backlash deck.
If played by Buh Buh Ray Dudley, reversals to this card are +10F.
Stun Value: 1
"Ouch! He measured that one, folks!" - Jim Ross

name: Body Scissors
effect:
Can only be played after a successfully played maneuver.
Cannot be reversed by the card titled Backlash!
When this card is in your Ring area, as a Mid-match action, you may put this card into your Ringside pile, look at your opponent's hand, and end your turn.

name: Breather Hold
effect:
When successfully played, your Fortitude Rating is considered to be # -1 until the end of the turn, where # is equal to your opponent's Fortitude Rating when you successfully play this card.
¶ (Restricted Modification Symbol)
"Sometimes you have to slow down the pace of a match to-" ... "More wisdom from all of your years in the ring...?" - Michael Cole & Tazz

name: Brock Lesnar
effect:
Superstar Ability:
Your opponent's Strike maneuvers played do no more than a maximum of 3D. You may play the card titled No Sell Maneuver.

name: Bulldog Takedown
effect:
Unless your Superstar is Trish Stratus, can only be played after the cards titled Jockeying for Position or Gut Wrench.
When successfully played, put 1 card from your Ringside pile into your hand.
Stun Value: 1
"Great Bulldog Takedown! Very innovative, taking two maneuvers and making a combination out of it." - Jim Ross

name: Butt Bump
effect:
As a maneuver, can only be played after a Set-up card. Your opponent must discard 1 card.
As a reversal, reverse any maneuver played after a Set-up card and end your opponent's turn.
Unique
Raw logo
Stun Value: 2
"There's a whole toolbox in Goldust's Arsenal." ... "J.R., I don't want to know about his toolbox..." - Jim Ross & Jerry Lawler

name: Cartwheel
effect:
Reverse any Set-up card and end your opponent's turn. Your opponent must overturn 3 cards from his Arsenal into his Ringside pile.
"That's just embarrassing-" ... "But fun to watch!" - Jim Ross & Jerry Lawler

name: Caught Red-handed
effect:
Your opponent may discard 1 Reversal card from his hand. If he does not, he must discard 3 random cards from his hand.
"Give me what I want ... or I'll take more than you bargained for." - Goldust

name: Check This Out!
effect:
Reveal your hand to your opponent, then search your Arsenal for 1 non-unique card, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your Arsenal. The card searched for cannot have the same title as any card in your hand.
Active

name: Corkscrew DDT
effect:
As a reversal, reverse any maneuver played after the card titled Irish Whip and end your opponent's turn.
Stun Value: 2
"He's launching him with an Atomic Back-OH MY! OH MY!" ... "Yeah, yeah, that was great, J.R.!" - Jim Ross & Jerry Lawler

name: Cruiserweight Title Belt
effect:
At the end of the Pre-match phase, search your Arsenal for 1 non-unique card with the Smackdown logo, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your Arsenal.
Your Superstar Value is +1
Smackdown logo
Universally Unique

name: Defensive Stance
effect:
When successfully played, announce one of the following: Strike, Grapple, Submission, OR High Risk.
When this card is in your Ring area, your opponent's maneuvers of the type chosen are -2D. As a Mid-match reversal you may remove this card from the game to reverse the type of maneuver named and end your opponent's turn.
Active

name: Desire
effect:
You must discard 1 card AND overturn 2 cards from your Arsenal into your Ringside pile.
When this card is in your Ring area, once per turn you may discard 1 Maneuver card to put 1 Maneuver card of the same type from your Ringside pile into your hand.
Active

name: Did I Just Say ... Three Minutes?
effect:
Remove up to 3 cards in your opponent's Ringside pile from the game.
Raw logo
Active
"Nah-nah-nah-nah ... nah-nah-nah-nah ... Hey-hey! Goodbye!" - Raw Fans' Chant

name: Director's Cut
effect:
Can only be played after a successfully played 4D or greater maneuver.
Cannot be reversed from your opponent's Backlash deck.
Unique
Raw logo
Stun Value: 2
"What more can Goldust do to his opponent?" ... "You don't want me to tell you, trust me." - Jim Ross & Jerry Lawler

name: Diving Takedown
effect:
As a maneuver, can only be played after a successfully played maneuver.
As an action, this card is -5F, you must discard this card, draw 1 card, and your opponent must discard 1 card. Doing this will cause no damage to your opponent.
Smackdown logo

name: Don't You Usually Wrestle in Dark Matches?
effect:
Can only be played if your opponent has a Superstar Value of 2 or less.
When this card is in your Ring area, your opponent cannot play any card with the word "McMahon" in the title or the card titled Here's a Ratings Booster!
Permanent

name: Double Elbow Drop
effect:
Can only be played after a 6D or greater maneuver.
When successfully played, put up to 3 cards with the Raw logo from your Ringside pile into your hand.
Raw logo
Unique
Multi
Stun Value: 2

name: Dragged to the Center of the Ring
effect: If your next card played this turn is a Submission maneuver, your opponent's reversals to it are +15F. The card titled Apply Illegal Leverage cannot be played after your next card played this turn.

name: Dudley Tough
effect:
Discard # cards and your opponent must discard # cards.
If played by Buh Buh Ray Dudley, do not discard your hand at the end of this turn for your Superstar Ability.
Raw logo
Unique

name: Educated Feet
effect:
When this card is your Ring area, your Maneuver cards with the word "kick" in the title are +2D.
If played by Rob Van Dam or Tajiri, this card is considered Permanent.
Active

name: Everything's Cool When You're...
effect:
Cannot be reversed.
When this card is your Ring area, before your Draw Segment, if you have 3 or fewer cards in your hand, draw up to 2 cards.
If an effect your opponent controls removes this card from your Ring area, draw up to 2 cards.
Raw logo
Unique

name: F-5
effect:
Cannot be reversed from your opponent's Backlash deck.
As a maneuver, can only be played after a successfully played Grapple maneuver.
As a reversal, reverse any Grapple, Submission, or High Risk maneuver and end your opponent's turn.
Smackdown logo
Unique
Stun Value: 3

name: Fall-Away Suplex
effect:
When this card is in your Ring area, your cards with the word "suplex" in the title are +1D.
"Tazz, I like the way he jumped while holding his opponent for the suplex and-" ... "It's a Fall-Away Suplex, Michael Cole. C'mon, say it, Cole! Fall ... Away ... Suplex! I know I asked it before, but how do you keep this job?" - Michael Cole & Tazz

name: Fire Extinguisher
effect:
Can only be played after the card titled Roll Out of the Ring.
Search your Arsenal for 1 non-unique Grapple maneuver, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your Arsenal.
When this card is in your Ring area, all Grapple maneuvers played by all players are +3D.
Raw logo
Active

name: Five Time! Five Time! Five Time! Five Time! Five Time!
effect:
Note: if title doesn't fit graphically, use: "Five Time, Sucka!"
Cannot be reversed if the card titled WCW Title Belt is in your Ring area.
Shuffle up to 5 cards from your Ringside pile into your Arsenal AND draw up to 5 cards.
Raw logo
Unique
"Can you dig it ..... SUCKA?!?!?!?!?!" - Booker T

name: Flying Body Lock
effect:
As a maneuver, can only be played after a successfully played 5D or greater maneuver.
As a reversal, reverse any card played after a Set-up card and end your opponent's turn.
Smackdown logo
¶ (Restricted Modification Symbol)
Multi
Stun Value: 1

name: Flying Mare
effect:
Can only be played after a successfully played maneuver with Stun Value.
If an effect your opponent controls removes this card from your Ring area, put 1 card from your Ringside pile into your hand.
Smackdown logo
"Nice snap on that Flying Mare." ... "Sure was - a terrific way to jumpstart this match... Get it, Tazz? Jump ... Flying? Tazz? TAZZ?!?!" - Tazz & Michael Cole

name: Freaks Are Cool!
effect:
When this card is in your Ring area, your non-unique Maneuver cards are -#F, where # is equal to your Superstar Value.
Raw logo
Unique

name: Game Over? You're Damn Right I'm Over!
effect:
At the end of the Pre-match phase, look at your opponent's hand. Shuffle any number of cards from your hand into your Arsenal, and then draw the same number of cards.
When this card is in your Ring area, your card titled Sledge Hammer Shot is -10F and you may ignore the "can only be played after..." text.
Raw logo
Unique

name: Get the "F" Out!
effect:
Reverse any non-Trademark-Finisher Unique Maneuver card OR completely reverse any Multi card and end your opponent's turn.
"Just take a little bit off the right side...." - WWE TV Commercial

name: Gettin' Beat Like a Government Mule
effect:
Can only be played after a successfully played non-multi Strike or Grapple maneuver.
Repeat the same maneuver effects and damage as printed on the card you just played as though it were played again. This card can be reversed as if it were that maneuver.
Raw logo

name: Go On - Give 'im Some Sugar!
effect:
If your next card played this turn is a Maneuver card, and your opponent reverses it from his hand OR Backlash deck, he must discard his hand.
Smackdown logo
Unique
"I'm not loose ... I'm just open - open for ... anything." - Nidia

name: Goldust
effect:
Superstar Ability:
Whenever you successfully play a maneuver, your opponent must discard 1 card.

name: Good Things Sometimes Happen
effect:
When this card is in your Ring area, your cards titled Flash in the Pan, Pat & Gerry, Call to the Crowd, Referee Finally Catches Something, Seeing Stars, Give It All I Got, and Let's Pick Up the Pace read as F: 0 and cannot be reversed.
Permanent

name: He's as Crazy as a Pet Raccoon
effect:
As an action, you must discard your hand.
As a reversal, reverse any card that would force your opponent to discard any number of cards OR would force him to overturn any number of cards from his Arsenal into his Ringside pile, and end your opponent's turn.
Raw logo

name: He's Runnin' Like a Scalded Dawg
effect:
Can only be played after a successfully played maneuver AND if your Fortitude Rating is greater than your opponent's Fortitude Rating.
When this card is in your Ring area, whenever your opponent successfully plays a card that moves any number of cards from his Ringside pile to any other location, he then must end his turn.
Raw logo

name: Hellfire Chokeslam
effect:
As a maneuver, can only be played after a successfully played 5D or greater maneuver.

Raw logo
Unique
Stun Value: 3

name: Here's a Ratings Booster!
effect:
Your next card played this turn is -#F, where # is equal to your opponent's Fortitude Rating.
Raw logo
"You think I don't know what you people want to see...? I know exactly what you want - and I'm going to give it to you. Right here, on RAW!" - Raw GM Eric Bischoff

name: Hold On! It's Not Time to Show Yet!
effect:
Can only be played if it is before your Draw Segment on the first turn of the game AND if your opponent has the card titled It's Showtime! in his Ring area.
If your opponent's hand size is greater than your hand size, draw up to 3 cards. On your opponent's next turn, he cannot play any non-maneuver cards with the words "cannot be reversed" in the text.
Active

name: Hold the Phone!
effect:
Reverse any Hybrid card and end your opponent's turn.
"You can paint a lot of different canvases with that same brush." ... "What are you talking about?" - Michael Cole & Tazz

name: Hot Tag! [Tag Team Only Symbol]
effect:
Can only be played if your opponents' Fortitude Rating is at least 10F greater than your Fortitude Rating.
Cannot be reversed.
As an action, your partner is now the active player and may begin his turn.
As a reversal, reverse any maneuver and end your opponent's turn.

name: Human Suplex Machine
effect:
Can only be played after a successfully played maneuver with the word "suplex" in the title.
Cannot be reversed by the card titled Backlash!
When successfully played, search your Arsenal for a card with the word "suplex" in the title, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your Arsenal.
Smackdown logo
Active

name: Hurrislam
effect:
Can be reversed by the card titled Elbow to the Face.
When successfully played, shuffle 1 card from your Ringside pile into your Arsenal, and then search your Arsenal for 1 card, put it into your hand, and shuffle your Arsenal.
Raw logo
Unique

name: I Aims ta be Startin' Sump'tin'
effect:
Remove the top card of your opponent's Arsenal from the game. Your opponent must reveal 3 Mid-match cards from his Backlash deck, you choose 1 card, put the chosen card into his Ringside pile, and put the other cards into his Backlash deck.
Active

name: I'm Jamie Noble, Boy!
effect:
Draw up to 4 cards.
Smackdown logo
Unique
"For years they said Jamie Noble was never gonna be nothin'. They said Jamie Noble was never gonna have nobody. Now I'm in the WWE, I got Nidia, I got the biggest trailer in town, so nobody's never gonna be thinkin' nothing bad 'bout me never again!"

effect:
As an action, put 1 hybrid Maneuver card from your Ringside pile into your hand and end your turn.

effect:

effect:

effect:

Unique

Unique

effect:

effect:

Unique

effect:

Raw logo
Unique
Stun Value: 3
"I've been with the best in this business - and most have come and gone - and none deliver the goods like these guys!" - Rico

name: Jamie Noble
effect:
Superstar Ability:
Whenever your opponent successfully plays a maneuver and damage has been applied, put 1 non-unique card from your Ringside pile into your hand. If you have the card titled Cruiserweight Title Belt in your Ring area, the card does not have to be non-unique. Your cards titled Kissing Up to the Stinkin' Fans and Trailer Park Trash are not considered Heel cards.

name: Just Hold On a Second, Mister!
effect:
The maximum number of Mid-match cards you may have in your Ring area is increased by 2.

Unique
Permanent

effect:

If your next card played this turn is a Maneuver card, it is -3F and +3D.
Active

name: Lariat Takedown
effect:

effect:

Unique

Active

effect:
Your opponent's Superstar-specific Mid-match Reversal cards that don't have a Raw OR Smackdown logo have the added text of "You must discard 4 cards. Reduce this number by 1 for every non-Pre-match card in your Ring area with the Raw or Smackdown logo."
¶ (Restricted Modification Symbol)
Active
Permanent

name: Reap the Rewards
effect:
Cannot be played if your opponent is Kurt Angle.
When this card is in your Ring area, whenever your opponent successfully plays a Face or Heel card, draw 1 card.
If played by Kurt Angle, this card is considered Permanent and whenever you successfully play a Face or Heel card, draw 1 card.
Active

name: Red Hook's Premiere Announcer
effect:
Your opponent's Starting Hand Size is -1.
The maximum number of Pre-match and Mid-match cards you may have in your Ring area is increased by 1.
Smackdown logo
Unique
Permanent

name: Regal Upper Class Punch
effect:
During your turn, if this card is in your Ringside pile, you may discard 1 card to put this card into your hand.
Raw logo
Unique
Stun Value: 1
"You lowly commoner, do you really fancy you can obstruct someone with my lineage? Whilst you try and try some more, your effort is futile - pure folly - and will, in the end, amount to nothing more than a nuisance." - William Regal

name: Remove the People's Elbow Pad
effect:
Can only be played after a successfully played Rock-specific maneuver OR if you reversed an opponent's maneuver with the card titled Spine Buster last turn and this is the first card played on this turn.
Your opponent cannot play Reversal cards from his hand for the rest of the turn.
When this card is in your Ring area, before your Draw Segment, you may put this card into your Backlash deck.
Smackdown logo
Unique

name: Rey Mysterio
effect:
Superstar Ability:
Whenever your opponent reverses a card from his hand or Backlash deck, you may discard 2 cards. If you do so, continue your turn.
Your cards titled From the Top Rope and Springboard are -5F.

name: Rey-Rey's Tope
effect:
As a maneuver, can only be played after a successfully played 4D or greater maneuver OR any card played after the card titled Irish Whip.
As a reversal, reverse the card titled Roll Out of the Ring and end your opponent's turn.
Smackdown logo
Unique
Stun Value: 2

name: Ring Psychology: Back
effect:
If you have 3 or more Grapple or Submission maneuvers in your Ring area with the word(s) "back," "power," or "slam" in the title, your opponent must discard 1 card from his hand in order to play a Grapple or High Risk maneuver.
If you have 6 or more Grapple or Submission maneuvers in your Ring area with the word(s) "back," "power," or "slam" in the title, your opponent cannot play Grapple or High Risk maneuvers.
Active
Permanent

name: Ring Psychology: Neck
effect:
If you have 4 or more maneuvers in your Ring area with the word(s) "clothesline," "neck," or "suplex" in the title, you may discard a card with the word "clothesline," "neck," or "suplex" in the title to reverse any Action played by your opponent and end your opponent's turn.
Active
Permanent

name: Roll Up
effect:
As a maneuver, can only be played after a successfully played 4D or greater maneuver.
As a reversal, reverse the card titled Back Body Drop and end your opponent's turn.
When successfully played, if your Fortitude Rating is at least 20F greater than your opponent's Fortitude Rating, OR if you have at least 5 cards more in your hand than your opponent, you win the game via Pinfall victory.
Smackdown logo

name: Rolling Headlock Vise
effect:
¶ (Restricted Modification Symbol)
Multi
"Tazz, I'm sorry, but I have to answer my cell phone - would you mind taking over?" ... "Sure - just call that last maneuver and you can go.... I'm waiting.... What is it, Cole? Say somethin' - make somethin' up if you have to!" - Michael Cole & Tazz

name: See How It Feels
effect: Search your opponent's hand, Backlash deck, Ringside pile, and Arsenal for his Trademark Finisher card and reveal it to your opponent. Your opponent shuffles his Arsenal. You may play his Trademark Finisher as your next card this turn as if it was in your hand. If you do not play it, then put it into your opponent's Ringside pile and end your turn. If it is successfully played, put it into your opponent's Ringside pile instead of your Ring area. If it is reversed, put it into your opponent's Ringside pile and end your turn.

name: Series of Back Breakers
effect:
Can only be played after a successfully played maneuver.
Cannot be reversed by the card titled Backlash!
You may play the card titled Maintain Hold after this card.
Smackdown logo
Unique
Stun Value: 2

name: Shattered Dreams
effect:
Cannot be reversed.
Can only be played after the card titled Throw Into the Corner Turnbuckle.
When successfully played, your opponent must discard his hand.
Raw logo
Unique
"When I'm through with you, you'll have nothing, not even your dreams - just long lost memories....." - Goldust

name: Shoot Aerial 360-Degree Kick
effect:
Can only be played after a successfully played 4D or greater maneuver.
Cannot be reversed by the card titled Roll Out of the Way. Your opponent cannot play the card titled Over Sell Maneuver immediately after you play this card.
¶ (Restricted Modification Symbol)
Stun Value: 1

name: Shoot Headlock
effect:
Cannot be reversed by the card titled Break the Hold. Your opponent cannot play the card titled Over Sell Maneuver immediately after you play this card.
During your turn, if this card is in your Ringside pile, you may discard 2 cards to put this card into your hand.
¶ (Restricted Modification Symbol)

name: Shoot Punch
effect:
Cannot be reversed by the card titled Step Aside. Your opponent cannot play the card titled Over Sell Maneuver immediately after you play this card.
If an effect your opponent controls removes this card from your Ring area, draw 1 card and end your opponent's turn.
¶ (Restricted Modification Symbol)

name: Shoot Slam
effect:
Cannot be reversed by the card titled Escape Move. Your opponent cannot play the card titled Over Sell Maneuver immediately after you play this card.
If an effect your opponent controls removes this card from your Ring area, look at your opponent's hand, choose 1 card, and your opponent discards the chosen card.
¶ (Restricted Modification Symbol)

name: Singapore Cane
effect:
Can only be played after a successfully played maneuver.
The next 2 Maneuver cards your opponent plays are considered to have blank text and are D: 0.
Raw logo
Active
"He's gonna be as effective as a one-legged man in an a%$-kickin' contest after that shot!" - Jim Ross

name: Single Leg Takedown
effect:
As a reversal, reverse any maneuver with the word "punch" in the title and end your opponent's turn.
When successfully played, search your Arsenal for a card with the word "takedown" in the title, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand and shuffle your Arsenal.

name: Slam Bomb
effect:
When successfully played, you must discard 1 card AND overturn 2 cards from your Arsenal into your Ringside pile.
Stun Value: 2
"It took just about everything he had, but dagummit, he dug down deep and pulled out a devastating maneuver. This one is about over!" - Jim Ross

name: Sleeper Bomb
effect:
Can only be played after the cards titled Sleeper, Jockeying for Position, OR Gut Wrench.
When successfully played, and damage has been applied, end your turn.
Multi
"I told you it was going to be an explosive evening tonight on Raw..." - Jim Ross

name: Standing Drop Kick
effect:
Unless your Superstar is Jeff Hardy, Lita, or Tajiri, can only be played if this is the first card played on your turn.
"Folks, that's one sweet drop kick - know what else is sweet? My barbeque sauce; it's sorta sweet, and sorta tangy, and definitely delicious!" - Jim Ross

name: That's J.R.'s Animal Hat Trick, Folks!
effect:
Can only be played if you have the cards titled He's as Crazy as a Pet Raccoon, Gettin' Beat Like a Government Mule, AND He's Runnin' Like a Scalded Dawg in your Ring area.
You win the game via a Pinfall victory.
Raw logo
Unique

name: That's Suicide!
effect:
Reverse any Strike, Grapple, or High Risk maneuver and end your opponent's turn. Search your Ringside pile and Arsenal for the cards titled Ride the Barricade and Whisper in the Wind, reveal them to your opponent, put them into your hand, and shuffle your Arsenal.
If the first card you play on your next turn is a High Risk maneuver, you may disregard the "Can only be played after..." text.
Raw logo
Unique

name: The 619
effect:
Can only be played after a successfully played maneuver.
Cannot be played after the card titled From the Top Rope.
Cannot be reversed.
Smackdown logo
Unique
Stun Value: 1

name: The Big Freak'n Machine
effect:
Superstar Ability:
Your first 2 non-Pre-match non-Reversal cards of the game can only be reversed from your opponent's Backlash deck and Arsenal.
You may play any cards with the Kane logo, but you do not count as Kane.

name: The Breakdown
effect:
As a maneuver, search your Arsenal for 1 unique card, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your Arsenal.
As a reversal, reverse any Strike or Grapple maneuver and end your opponent's turn.
When this card is in your Ring area, whenever you successfully play the card titled Jerichoholics, your opponent must discard 3 cards.
Raw logo
Unique
Stun Value: 2

name: The Fire Still Burns
effect:
If your next card played this turn is a Maneuver card, it is +#D, where # is equal to the Stun Value in your Ring area and it can only be reversed from your opponent's Backlash deck and Arsenal.
Raw logo
Unique

name: The Game
effect:
Superstar Ability:
At the start of your turn, before your Draw Segment, look at the top 3 cards of your Arsenal and put them back in any order.
You may play any cards with the Triple H logo, but you do not count as Triple H.

name: The Game Interferes!
effect:
Can only be played if your Fortitude Rating is less than your opponent's Fortitude Rating.
Cannot be played if your opponent is Triple H or The Game.
Reverse any Strike, Grapple, or Submission maneuver and end your opponent's turn.
Raw logo
Unique

name: The Game's Sleeper
effect:
This card is -3F for each Maneuver type in your Ring area.
Can be reversed by the card titled Break the Hold.
When successfully played, search your Arsenal for the card titled Maintain Hold, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your Arsenal. You may play the card titled Maintain Hold after this card.
Raw logo
Unique
Stun Value: 2

name: The King Interferes!
effect:
Reverse any Foreign Object card OR any 10D or greater maneuver and end your opponent's turn.
If played by a Female Superstar, instead reverse any Foreign Object card OR any 6D or greater maneuver and end your opponent's turn.
Raw logo
Active

name: The Next Big Thing
effect:
Reveal the top card of your Arsenal to your opponent and put it into your hand. If it is the next card you play this turn, it cannot be reversed.
When this card is in your Ring area, before your Draw Segment, you may put this card into your hand.
Smackdown logo
Unique

name: The People's Champion
effect:
Superstar Ability:
Your maneuvers cannot be reversed from your opponent's Backlash deck.
You may play any cards with The Rock logo, but you do not count as The Rock.

name: The People's DDT
effect:
As a reversal, reverse any Strike maneuver and end your opponent's turn.
When successfully played, search your Arsenal for 1 card with the word "people" or "spine buster" in the title, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your Arsenal.
Smackdown logo
Unique
Stun Value: 2

name: The People's Kip-up
effect:
Reverse any card played after a 5D or greater maneuver and end your opponent's turn. The first card you play on your next turn cannot be reversed.
When this card is in your Ring area, your cards titled Patented Rock Footstomp are -5F.
Smackdown logo
Unique

name: The Ref Got in the Way!
effect:
Reverse any non-unique card that would remove any number of cards from your Ring area and end your opponent's turn.
When this card is in your Ring area, if an effect your opponent controls removes any number of cards from your Ring area, your opponent must discard 1 card for each card removed.
Active

name: The Trailer Hitch
effect:
As a maneuver, you may play the card titled Maintain Hold after this card.
As a reversal, reverse any Submission maneuver and end your opponent's turn.
Smackdown logo
Unique
Stun Value: 2
"Start up the pick-up, Nidia - and make sure the double-wide is secure. We're gonna win this one!" - Jamie Noble

name: The West Coast Pop
effect:
Can only be played after a successfully played 6D or greater maneuver OR if you reversed a card from your hand to end your opponent's last turn and this is your first card played on this turn.
When successfully played, if you have 5 or more cards in your hand than your opponent, you win the game via a Pinfall victory.
Smackdown logo
Unique
Stun Value: 3

name: Throwin' Big Ol' Soup Bones in the Corner
effect:
Can only be reversed from your opponent's Arsenal.
As a maneuver, can only be played after the card titled Throw Into the Corner Turnbuckle or a successfully played 4D or greater maneuver.
As a reversal, reverse any card played after the card titled Throw Into the Corner Turnbuckle and end your opponent's turn.
¶ (Restricted Modification Symbol)
Smackdown logo
Unique
Stun Value: 1

name: Title Belt Clubberin'
effect:
Can only be played if there is a Title Belt card in any Ring area.
Can only be reversed by cards that specifically reverse the card titled Roll Out of the Ring OR a card played after it.
As a maneuver, can only be played after the card titled Roll Out of the Ring.
As a reversal, reverse any card played after the card titled Roll Out of the Ring and end your opponent's turn.
When successfully played, your opponent must discard 4 cards.

name: Too Fast For You
effect:
Reverse any maneuver and end your opponent's turn. Draw up to 2 cards.
Smackdown logo
Unique
"He's a bundle of kinetic energy, that Rey Mysterio." ... "Yeah, and he's quick, too." - Michael Cole & Tazz

name: Unorthodox Style of Wrestling
effect: When this card is in your Ring area, whenever you play a High Risk maneuver after a Submission maneuver, it cannot be reversed from your opponent's hand.

name: Velocity
effect:
When this card is in your Ring area, as a Mid-match action, you may put this card into your Ringside pile and draw up to # cards, where # is equal to the number of cards in your Ring area with the Raw or Smackdown logo. You cannot draw more than 5 cards in this manner.
Active

name: Victim of the Revolving Leg Drop
effect:
Can only be played after a 3D or greater maneuver.
When successfully played, draw up to 3 cards.
Raw logo
Unique
Stun Value: 1
"I haven't seen anyone spin around and land so hard since - um, never mind." - Jerry Lawler

name: Waist Lock
effect:
When successfully played, choose a card in your opponent's Ring area. When this card is in your Ring area, the chosen card is considered to have blank text.
You cannot play the card titled Maintain Hold immediately after this card.
When this card is in your Ring area, on your opponent's turn he may discard an applicable Reversal card to put this card into your Ringside pile.

name: Wanna Know What I'm Gonna Do?
effect:
Put up to 2 cards from your Ringside Pile on top of your Arsenal in any order.
"They say that just when you thought you had all the answers, I change the questions - but I rather just come up with more problems that you aren't going to solve." - Raw GM Eric Bischoff

name: We're Sorry ... But This Has Gone Too Far
effect:
Reverse any non-Trademark-Finisher maneuver and end your opponent's turn. If played by Billy Gunn, your opponent skips his next turn.
Smackdown logo
Unique

name: When Hulkamania Runs Wild on You!
effect:
If the card titled Whatcha Gonna Do, Brotha? is in your Ringside pile, this card is -5F.
Look at your opponent's hand, choose 1 card, and your opponent discards the chosen card. Your next two cards played this turn cannot be reversed.
Smackdown logo
Unique

name: World Heavyweight Title Belt
effect:
Cannot be played if the card titled WCW Title Belt is in your Ring area, nor can you play that card.
At the end of the Pre-match phase, search your Arsenal for 1 non-unique card with the Raw logo, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your Arsenal.
Your Superstar Value is +2.
Raw logo
Universally Unique

name: Yo, Ese, I Know You, Homes!
effect:
Your card titled Eddie's Roll Up is -10F.
If your opponent is Chris Benoit, Edge, Rob Van Dam, Rey Mysterio, or The People's Champion, your Superstar Ability now reads as "Each turn, the first two High Risk maneuvers you play cannot be reversed."
Smackdown logo
Unique
Permanent

name: You Bring the A%$, We'll Bring the Whoopin'!
effect:
If played from your hand, reverse any maneuver and end your opponent's turn. Draw 1 card. On your next turn, your opponent cannot reverse cards from his Arsenal.
Smackdown logo
Unique
"Hush ... hush ... HUSH! If you listen, listen real good, you can hear them, all the people chanting, all the people chanting the winner of this match - listen!" - The People's Champion

name: You Can't Spell "Furniture" Without F-U-N
effect:
When this card is in your Ring area, your cards titled Table! Table! Table! and Ladder in the Ring read as F: 3 and you can ignore the "can only be played after..." text. Reversals to your cards titled Chair Shot are +4F.
Raw logo
Permanent

name: You Don't Want to Play Me
effect:
Your next Maneuver card played this turn cannot be reversed.
Raw logo
Unique
"He is one game - THE game - you don't want to play." - Ric Flair

name: Your Three Minutes Are Up!
effect:
Reverse any Strike or Grapple maneuver and end your opponent's turn.
Raw logo
Unique
"You know what's next, King - Rico is about to enter this equation." ... "Yeah, J.R., once he comes, no one will be the same." - Jim Ross & Jerry Lawler
